content:
This doesn't seem to be working on the web version of Lean:

import order.succ_pred.basic

#check order.le_succ_iff_lt_or_eq

despite this theorem being listed in the mathlib docs. Is this because the web version is running on an older version of mathlib, or am I doing something wrong?
That lemma looks like it was renamed just two days ago, and it used to be succ_order.le_succ_iff_lt_or_eq (which does work in the web version). I'm not sure how often it's updated.
Matt Diamond has marked this topic as resolved.
(Whoops, looks like the job that updates the web editor was paused due to inactivity in the repo. I've enabled it again.)
